definition: madder (Rubia cordifolia)/to hunt for/to gather/to collect
to gather/to collect/collected works/classifier for sections of a TV series etc: episode

sentences.english: The students collected a bag of bark for their science project.
sentences.chinese: 學生爲進行科學計畫蒐集了一袋樹皮。

sentences.english: Chapter four makes a collection and arrangement in terms of Ho Group Hunting Oracle.
sentences.chinese: 第四章對何組田獵卜辭進行蒐集和整理。

sentences.english: It can change material roller and collect materials automatically.
sentences.chinese: 它可以改變材料的壓路機和蒐集材料不攻自破。

sentences.english: The children love to collect the colorful Hsiang Bao.
sentences.chinese: 小孩喜歡蒐集鮮豔的香包。

sentences.english: She collected many writing materials through a series of investigations and surveys.
sentences.chinese: 一系列內查外訪，她蒐集到了許多寫作素材。

sentences.english: He showed his friends the precious stamps which he has collected these years.
sentences.chinese: 他把這些年來所蒐集的珍貴郵票拿給朋友看。

sentences.english: She began working when she was 4, collecting grasses that her father wove into mats.
sentences.chinese: 當她只有四歲時，便爲編制草蓆的父親蒐集青草。

sentences.english: He is a man of ex-plays (criminal record).
sentences.chinese: 他是一個蒐集犯罪證據的人。

sentences.english: He asked someone else to do all the legwork of gathering information.
sentences.chinese: 他叫了別人來做所有蒐集資料的跑腿活。

sentences.english: The material collected from a number of websites, and edited by a lawyer.
sentences.chinese: 本文素材蒐集自多家網站，由佳和律師編輯整理。

sentences.english: Book I gleans nearly seventy tales of the art of management.
sentences.chinese: 第一冊蒐集了近七十個有關管理藝術的故事。

sentences.english: The port scanning also is the hacker collects the goal main engine information one commonly used method.
sentences.chinese: 端口掃描也是黑客蒐集目標主機信息的一種常用方法。

sentences.english: Since last week, police have interviewed members of the polygamist sect looking for evidence.
sentences.chinese: 警方自上週起詢問了一夫多妻組織的成員，蒐集證據。

sentences.english: These pictures are collected without choice.
sentences.chinese: 這些畫是不分好壞蒐集來的。

sentences.english: The underneath is the standpoint that the water demon takes a wide view some movie review a collection editor.
sentences.chinese: 下面是水妖縱觀一些影評蒐集編輯的觀點。

sentences.english: He is to spy and gather information that will help the Sky People conquer the land.
sentences.chinese: 他去偵察和蒐集情報，將幫助天空人征服這片土地。

definition: to collect and organize (papers etc)/to archive (data)/to summarize (evidence etc)/summary
to thumb through/to flip through (a book)
to do textual research/to make textual criticism/to verify by means of research (esp. historical details)/to take an exam to get a certificate (abbr. for 考取證件|考取证件[kao3 qu3 zheng4 jian4])
old property (esp. inherited from former generation)/former territory
archive of graphics (e.g. maps, documents or botanical figures)/atlas/collection of illustrations or sheet music
lit. looking for a fine horse using only a picture (idiom)/fig. to do things along rigid, conventional lines/to try and find sth with the help of a clue
